stories.text: I've got major maintainability problems with my kind of amateurish webapp. I spent a bit of time the other day writing a bunch code that I just found out I had already written awhile back. I see a bunch of guides on Google but it's hard to judge how good they are without references/reviews. Are there some in depth guides on separation of concerns, service-oriented architecture, MVC, file structure, etc using Express? Or perhaps a really good reference project or two?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best way to structure/architect an API with ExpressJS/TypeScript?

stories.text:
Do you have a website dedicated to photos (your own or otherwise)? If you did in the past what made you stop? Did you build it yourself? How easy is it to update?

In the interests of not seeming like a shill I'm not going to post my own photoblog ;-)
stories.title: Ask HN: Do You Have a Photoblog?

stories.text:
One of my computers has been offline for years. The current chrome vesion on it is 60 or so, which was released in 2018, but the copyright nofication on the "about" window says 2021 instead of 2018? How is this possible if it is offline and never updated?

here is an exmaple of what I mean:

https://www.ghacks.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/google-chrome-security-update-93.0.4577.82.png
stories.title: How can Chrome update the copyright if offline?
